欢迎来到 mTNT Blog 🚀

这里会记录 mTNT OS 的开发日志、设计思路和实践经验。

mTNT OS 是一个基于Linux+LLM技术构建的AI操作系统，让人人都能开发自己的AI应用是这个项目的使命。交互抛弃传统的键盘+鼠标，自然语言交互+触摸控制是主要交互方式。

Welcome to mTNT Blog 🚀

This blog documents the development logs, design ideas, and practical experiences of mTNT OS.

mTNT OS is an AI Operating System built on LLM technology. The mission of this project is to enable everyone to develop their own AI applications. Interaction abandons traditional keyboard + mouse, with natural language interaction + touch control as the primary interaction methods.

项目特色 / Project Features

  • 🤖 AI驱动 / AI-Driven: 基于LLM技术的智能操作系统 / Intelligent OS based on LLM technology
  • 🖐️ 触摸交互 / Touch Interaction: 自然语言+触摸控制 / Natural language + touch control
  • 🔒 隐私保护 / Privacy Protection: 本地化实现，保护个人隐私 / Localized implementation, protecting personal privacy
  • 🐧 Linux生态 / Linux Ecosystem: 充分发挥Linux软件生态优势 / Leveraging the full power of Linux software ecosystem
  • ☁️ 混合架构 / Hybrid Architecture: 支持云端与本地混合部署 / Supporting cloud and local hybrid deployment

Welcome to explore and join our AI operating system development journey!
